post_text:
We are excited to welcome Mrs. McInerney (Mrs. Mac) to the high school!
"I grew up in Michigan and graduated from Michigan State University with a Bachelor's in physics and minor in mathematics and Spanish. Over the past 8 years I have taught in the inner city of Chicago, rural communities in Colorado, and suburban college town of Fort before returning back to Michigan to raise my two children (3yrs, 2yrs) near their grandparents. I am currently working on my Masters degree in Science Education, and expect to be completed by the Summer of 2019.

After school, I enjoy spending time with my two boys and husband, biking, hiking, camping, and boating in the summers and snowboarding in the winters. When I have some peaceful moments to myself I also can absorb any book about science, philosophy, childhood development, or fiction."
